title: Lulu VU
body:
Hey Rito Game, big fan here.

So {{champion:117}}  VU when? 
Her in-game model is atrocious. When will she be more like {{champion:78}}  and {{champion:18}} ?

replies.body: She might be considered for an Ezreal/Trist-level update. Not only is her model dated, but her kit could be tweaked so she's less of a balance problem.
Bandle City champions in general need a touch up.

> [{quoted}](name=Zapzya,realm=OCE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=6ntpnvwK,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-09-08T03:22:36.862+0000)
>
> Bandle City champions in general need a touch up.

Well every Yordle released before Gnar that werent already visually updated after that....which means those that need updating are Corki, Veigar, Rumble, Lulu, Teemo, Fizz, Kennen, and maybe even Amumu (he needs a VU, just not sure that he is a Yordle).

i want riot to update her Wicked and Dragon trainer skins
Especially dragon trainer because it's epic
Zoey can't be left to be the only disneycuesque character, Rito pls.
